document.full_text: virtual wallet technology that lets people pay for a coffee, newspaper or sandwich by swiping a cell phone at a checkout is finally set to start rolling out, executives told the reuters technology summit this week in paris.
document.title: mobile wallet roll out starts with small change
lines_and_colors: virtual wallet technology that lets people pay for a coffee, newspaper or sandwich by swiping a cell phone at a checkout is finally set to start rolling out, executives told the reuters technology summit this week in paris.
